Active Planned Care / GoalsStart DateReason
Musculoskeletal care24-Oct-2021Osteoarthritis of knee
  • Reduce knee pain severity to a tolerable level to improve function and quality of life.
  • Increase ability to walk and perform daily activities without significant limitation from knee osteoarthritis.
  • Decrease swelling and inflammation in the affected knee to improve comfort and mobility.
Diabetes self management plan20-Aug-2005Prediabetes
  • Achieve and maintain HbA1c below 6.5% through lifestyle modification and self-management.
  • Reduce body weight to support improved glucose metabolism.
  • Engage in at least 150 minutes of moderate-intensity physical activity per week.
  • Maintain blood pressure below 130/80 mmHg to reduce cardiovascular risk.
